review: Great product.  Easy to install and use.
author: Beth Brown

review: It works fine but somewhat disappointed in the free movie and tv programs that are actually free to watch. Very limited options.
author: Steven L. Pedersen

review: Very useful if you subscribe to prime.  The processor was so much better than my Roku 3 it was a pleasure to use.
author: politicod "politicod"

review: Still getting into using this but so far so good - like the movies to watch
author: kathy hilleary

review: well we did it!  Thought it would be a struggle, but connected fire stick and began watching watching a Netflix movie in no time.  Probably 20 minutes max.  Picture is good.  Can't wait to spend some time exploring.  Well worth the investment.
author: gingerky

review: I am loving my fire tv stick! It was so very easy to install and it gives everything advertised. I have recommended it to several friends and my doctor. So glad I  bought it.
author: Sunshine Berry

review: Overall, pretty nice device.  But some news apps are useless .. Like CBS News.  Frequent freezes, looping and truncated news by commercials.
author: debra love
